org.usgs.manifold.database

Class DatabaseInsertThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.usgs.manifold.database.DatabaseInsertThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DatabaseInsertThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    A consumer thread to read DatabaseInsertStatements off a BlockingQueue and execute them on a given database connection.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseInsertThread

        public DatabaseInsertThread(java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<DatabaseInsertStatement> statements,
                    java.lang.String dbURL)
        Parameters:
        statements - a blocking queue of DatabaseInsertStatement objects to run on the database connection.
        dbURL - database connection string specifying the address, username and password.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Reads DatabaseInsertStatement objects from the blocking queue and uses them to insert data into a database. If there is an SQLException the database connection is closed and a reconnection attempt is made but the data from the DatabaseInsertStatement is lost.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • stopRun

        public void stopRun()
        Stop the thread after it completes its current loop.
